channel.title: 317 [PI]slayer tower stair cases don't work

item.title: 317 [PI]slayer tower stair cases don't work
item.dc:creator: @jwags jwags
item.description:
@jwags wrote:

ok so well i have worked with the code a little but no luck

in actionhandler i have

[code] //here
case 4496:
if (c.heightLevel == 2)
c.getPA().movePlayer(3412,

3541, 1);
else if (c.heightLevel == 1)
c.sendMessage("DA HELL YOU

JUST DO?");

	break;

	case 4494:
		if (c.heightLevel == 2) 
			c.getPA().movePlayer(3412,

3540, 1);
else if (c.heightLevel == 1)
c.getPA().movePlayer(3436 ,

3535, 0);

	break;
	
	case 4493:
		if (c.heightLevel == 0) 
			c.getPA().movePlayer(3439,

3537, 1);
else if (c.heightLevel == 1)
c.getPA().movePlayer

(c.absX, c.absY, 2);

	break;
	
	case 4495:
		if (c.heightLevel == 1) 
			c.getPA().movePlayer(3417,

3541, 2);

	break;
	//end[/code]

and in clickobject i got

[code]break;
case 4493:
c.objectDistance = 5;
break;
case 4494:
c.objectDistance = 5;
break;
case 4496:
c.objectDistance = 5;
break;
case 4495:
c.objectDistance =

5;
break;[/code]

when i click a ladder i either have to do ::kick myname

or close browser
